commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'd like to offer my apologies for the other day. You were right, Shioriko. And thanks for helping out with the live stream. Ayumu told me everything.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Not at all. I was out of line that day as well. I am truly glad you and Ayumu have reconciled.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yes, this whole experience has made me realize a lot of things, like parts of myself I need to improve and how important Ayumu is to me.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Learning from one's mistakes is commendable. You were the one who worked things out with the other club presidents who were against me for the school tour, after all.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Perhaps you were more emotional this time since a beloved friend of yours was involved, but I am sure the same could be said for Uehara as well.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: However, this is precisely why you should not be exchanging harsh words. You should be listening carefully to each other's words from the heart.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Shioriko...

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: If another episode like this happens again, I'll...be here.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Laugh* I'll keep that in mind.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: You are blessed to have such a wonderful childhood friend.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Yes, come in.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Hello! Hm? What's up with you two? Something funny happen?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: We were just talking about you.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Huh? Don't tell me it's something embarrassing?!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: *Chuckle* No, not at all. I was just saying how jealous I am of your club president for having such a wonderful childhood friend as you.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: What? Oh, uh, really?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yup.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: You're kinda making me blush... Um, we finished preparing for the party so I came here to call you over.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, that's right! Part of the reason I came here was to invite you, Shioriko. Would you join us?

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yeah, come along! It'll be fun.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: While I appreciate the kind invitation, I will have to decline as I still have some student council duties to tend to. Please do enjoy yourselves on my behalf.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I see... That's a shame.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Then will you come if you finish up your work early?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Yes, I'll do just that.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: You better!

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: I will.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: We're waiting for you, Shioriko! Got that?

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Now everything is as it should be. The School Idol Club I love is back.

commands.speaker: Shioriko
commands.line: Your dreams will not elude you if you go step by step and persevere. You really have made your dreams a reality.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: All right! Let's have a toast to celebrate gathering 1,000 volunteers! Cheers!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Cheers!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: A thousand volunteers. This time it's not a dream, right?!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Ayumu's live stream sure did have a huge impact!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Yup, yup! I got emotional just watching it as well. I started bawling my eyes out when everyone got together!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: That live stream's still being talked about, even now.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: The number of visits to our website just keeps going up. It's like we've made a miraculous comeback!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Everyone's hearts must've been touched by Ayumu's simple, sincere words.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I felt kind of embarrassed tuning into some parts of it, but I suppose it wasn't a bad live stream!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: It was great that you were able to show the people behind the festival and how they felt about it.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: It's gone viral because of all the people talking about that video and wanting to help everyone at Nijigasaki put the School Idol Festival together.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: The school idol live stream I watch also plugged the video and helped us out by asking for volunteers!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Same for the show I watch, too! It's like everyone's filled with the passion to want to do something themselves to help out.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: It's those people who've kept the School Idol Festival trending as the number one school idol topic.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: It totally feels like all the school idols and school idol fans around the country are focused on the festival.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: The fair winds are filling up our sails! Aye aye, am I right?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: We have all of the Nijigasaki girls to thank for everything, zura.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: A fine achievement, little demons. Let us enjoy this party today to the fullest.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: The major problem of nailing down a venue has been solved thanks to the Nijigasaki girls, so now all that's left is to make sure the festival's a success.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: We can't go off giving sloppy performances with all of these eyes on us. We gotta polish ourselves up.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: That's right! Time to crank up the intensity starting tomorrow.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Then let us make sure we recharge ourselves today to take on tomorrow.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Let's make sure this event is worthwhile for all the school idols on stage...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: ...the volunteers supporting the event, and for all the people attending it.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: At the very least, I'm already glad to be a part of it myself.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: *Giggle* Me too. I am sure everyone here feels the same way!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: *Laugh* For sure!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Shioriko's also offered the help of the student council, so now it really feels like everyone is pitching in to help.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Let's show them how grateful we are at the School Idol Festival!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Come Together!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Dream Together!
